app.description: Displays customer, order and subscriptions details from Infusionsoft
app.name: Infusionsoft App

subdomain.label: Infusionsoft App Name
subdomain.helpText: Enter the first part of the subdomain only here. For example enter 'yourcompany'

token.label: API token
token.helpText: You can find your Infusionsoft API token in the Infusionsoft Admin settings section

contacts.empty: We're sorry but it appears we were unable to match this end-user with an Infusionsoft contact. You can try searching instead.
contacts.create: Create a contact for this end-user

global.limitReached: You reached the maximum limit of results to display. Please contact Support for additional information.

default.title: An error has occured
default.message: There was an error loading contact data. Please try again later.

badGateway.message: There was an error connecting to Infusionsoft. Please ensure the Subdomain and API token are correct in your settings.

addTag.error: Failed to add tag to contact. Check to see if you have already added it
